meanings.definition: Items that are able to be sold.
meanings.sent1: The market was full of vendibles waiting to be purchased.
meanings.sent2: The store stocked a variety of vendibles for customers to buy.
meanings.sent3: The little girl set up a pretend shop with her toys as vendibles for her friends to 'buy'.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the most precious vendible she had to offer.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly baked cookies was the most enticing vendible at the bake sale.

meanings.definition: Goods that are available for purchase.
meanings.sent1: The vendor displayed his vendibles neatly on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: Online stores offer a wide range of vendibles to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The cat considered the shiny trinket as a potential vendible to trade for treats.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the most valuable vendible in the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons were the most eye-catching vendibles at the fair.
